title: MD
biography: Sandesh Jhingan is an Indian professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Indian Super League club Goa and the India national team.
aiSummary: A. K. Jhingan is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 28 at Endocrinology (Member). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
